About.title: Ariel Ignacio Jimenez
About.description: I am an experienced fullstack developer proficient in the use of Django and React. I am capable of building robust APIs with Django Rest Framework, and I also have strong skills in frontend technologies such as CSS, HTML, and JavaScript.
